ED_Title: Groups  of countries in special situations
ED_DecisionText: At its 54th plenary meeting, on 17 December 2021, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Second Committee.(Footnote: A/76/535)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
